promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic mythical swan water-type with ornate feathers. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or water:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Plentiswan, a gigantic mythical swan water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: aqua-cutter. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word swan or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, swan-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: Plentiswan is an enigmatic giant that lurks in river habitats. It uses razor-sharp fins to slice through the water with grace and ease.
